|brand = technicolor |model = CM-7600 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = set top box |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = G95-CM-7600 |icid = 431C-DWT765CHA |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88DE3218;BG4CT; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v7) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;THGBMFG6C1LBAIL; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5AN4G6NAFR; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = FC:94:E3, |oui = FC:94:E3,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Android TV;7.0;Nougat;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, PCIe, MicroSD Card slot, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 LE, DFS (slave), HDMI 2.0, 4K, HDR, 3D, ATSC tuner, SPDIF out, Chromecast, |addchip = RF Demodulator;MStar;MSB1237;M, MSB1237, A7MNB10ZA, 1715B;2; ,,, Tuner;Rafael Micro;R836C?;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = technicolor |manuf_model = DWT765CHA |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Channel Master CM-7600}} <!--{{FCC ST|08/20/2018|indexme.}}--> The CPU ID is not clear in the FCC photos but it appears to be from Marvell. :[[Marvell]] 88DE3218 / [[Synaptics]] BG4CT (Armada 1500 Ultra) :Quad Core @1.2/1.5 GHz (ARM Cortex-A53); GPU: Vivante GC7000XS
*[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/streaming-gaming/channel-master-stream ''Channel Master Stream+'' on '''Android TV Guide'''] (Spec.)
===Specifications=== *Brand: Channel Master *Model: Stream+ (CM-7600) *Manufacturer: Technicolor *Code name: DWT765CHA (Skipper) *SoC: [[Marvell]] BG4CT (Armada 1500 Ultra) *CPU: Quad-core @1.2GHz *GPU: Vivante GC7000XS *Storage: 8GB; RAM: 2GB *Broadcast: Dual-ATSC, IPTV *Android TV: 7.0 (Nougat) *Year: 2018; Country: USA *Dimensions: 104×83×72 mm *Weight: 270g
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.technicolor.com/news/fierce-innovation-award-goes-technicolor-s-skipper ''technicolor Skipper''] *[https://www.channelmaster.com/Antenna_DVR_s/336.htm ''An OTA DVR and Streaming Box for Antenna Owners'']
